# GitHub Repository Topics

Use these topics when creating/updating your GitHub repository:

```
nodejs
express
sequelize
jwt
jwt-authentication
api
rest-api
template
boilerplate
monolith
monolithic
postgresql
supabase
backend
server
express-server
nodejs-template
nodejs-boilerplate
express-template
feature-first
clean-architecture
production-ready
starter-template
backend-template
api-template
```

## How to add topics on GitHub:

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Click "Save changes"

This will help your repository be discovered by developers searching for Node.js templates and boilerplates.
